title: Communication Marines connect, keep 3rd MEB running during PHIBLEX 2015 (US Marines Corps)
text: ( Source : US Marines Corps ) CLARK AIR BASE , Philippines -- Internet, phones and network communication are all vital to the Marine Corps ' mission during expeditionary operations. Communication is the direct link between command elements,
